definition: righteousness/virtuous cause/a woman's marriage/main points of a piece of writing
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
devotion to righteousness that inspires reverence (idiom)
to place righteousness before family (idiom); ready to punish one's own family if justice demands it
to have a high notion of one's duty/to be highly principled

sentences.english: He can withhold the China nationalism and in the same time to blow his horn of democracy loudly.
sentences.chinese: 他一边能守住民族大义，也能高吹民主的号角。

sentences.english: A perfect example of how you can say a lot by saying very little.
sentences.chinese: 一个“微言大义”式的完美范例。
英雄可以容或者大义凛然。

sentences.english: DA YI XU LUE is a attempt of orthodox theory. It has important historical value.
sentences.chinese: 《大义叙略》是郑思肖正统论的实践尝试。

sentences.english: However, Di Gong morally justified to argue without compromise.
sentences.chinese: 但是狄公大义凛然，据理争辩毫不妥协。

sentences.english: Human righteousness, but in the righteous cause of the front, to put aside personal affair.
sentences.chinese: 为人仁义，但在大义面前，能够放下个人私情。

sentences.english: You destroy your relation. Both God and human angry with me.
sentences.chinese: 大人你大义灭亲，我就人神共愤。

sentences.english: We're all going to be Japanese collaborators. Even the dogs you Fangs keep stand by justice and righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 我们全要做汉奸，只有你方家养的狗都深明大义的。

sentences.english: It costs $12,000 a year rehabilitate a kid at Daytop.
sentences.chinese: 在大义堂感化一个儿童一年耗费一万二。

sentences.english: They contend for righteousness and not for profit, thereby showing what is righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 争大义而不争小利，这是为了表示战争的正义性。

sentences.english: May the gods bless this grateful heart!
sentences.chinese: 愿神祗保佑这深明大义的孩子。

sentences.english: People like us must never seek petty advantages at the expense of justice and righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 咱们这种人，万万不可以贪小利而忘大义。

sentences.english: The first is from the son of the righteous cause of Jie Zhi mother.
sentences.chinese: 首先是大义从子志的介子推母。

definition: to give up life for righteousness (idiom, from Mencius); to choose honor over life/would rather sacrifice one's life than one's principles
state/country/the Gods of earth and grain
to display utter loyalty/to be loyal to the end
to have a high notion of one's duty/to be highly principled
Jente township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
rebels and traitors (idiom)/general term for scoundrel
compassion, duty, propriety and integrity (idiom); all the traditional virtues/mainly used sarcastically, to mean hypocritical
